titles.title: Piscataway National Park Expansion Act of 1993
Piscataway Park Expansion Act of 1994
Piscataway National Park Expansion Act of 1994
Piscataway National Park Expansion Act of 1994
Piscataway Park Expansion Act of 1994
A bill to expand the boundaries of the Piscataway National Park, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16453-16454)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-610.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-275.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 446.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Received in the House.
Held at the desk.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources (Sep 13, 1994).
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands Prior to Referral.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held and Forwarded to Full Committee by the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands Prior to Referral (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-682.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 372.

action.text: Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at the desk: House amendments to Senate bill.
Senate agreed to the House amendments by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 8/8/1994--Passed House amended. Piscataway Park Expansion Act of 1994 - Revises the boundaries of Piscataway National Park, Maryland, to include additional lands. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands and interests therein within the areas added to the Park. Authorizes appropriations.
